Content.Text:
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To ship an item, examine the shipping
bin to open the shipping bin screen.
I'll show you its contents.

This is the shipping bin screen.
Here you can ship items in your bag.

From the list on the bottom screen,
choose the item you want to ship and
the number of it you want to ship.

<RED>Once you have shipped an item you
cannot get it back</RED>, so be careful.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's all for my explanation. I
hope you'll use the shipping bin all
the time!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be on my way. I hope you have a
productive day today, <MYNAME>.
